meanings.definition: To mark or sign with one's initials.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys initialing her artwork before displaying it.
meanings.sent2: He is initialing the contract to make it official.
meanings.sent3: The cat keeps initialing its territory with tiny paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The sun initialing the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the students to practice initialing their assignments for identification.

meanings.definition: The act of signing or marking with initials.
meanings.sent1: The initialing of the document was a quick process.
meanings.sent2: His initialing on the letter indicated his approval.
meanings.sent3: The initialing on the cake spelled out 'HBD' for Happy Birthday.
meanings.sent4: The initialing on the map marked the location of buried treasure.
meanings.sent5: The initialing on the painting added a personal touch to the masterpiece.
